column2: "Na Josef hyɛɛ ne fie somfo no dɛ
column3: Fa edziban dodowara a nkorɔfo no botum asoa hyehyɛ hɔn nkotoku mu
column4: na fa nyimpa biara ne sika hyɛ no kotoku ano."

column3: mekyerɛ me dwetɛ kɔɔpow no
column4: hyɛ hɔn mu kakraba no no kotoku mu
column5: nye n'eburow sika no. Na ɔyɛɛ dɛ mbrɛ Josef kae no ara."

column2: "Enyim tsetsewee ara na wogyaa nkorɔfo no kwan
column3: hɔn nye hɔn nsoasopɔnkɔ."
na wonnyae nndur ekyirekyir no
column4: Josef see ne somfo no dɛ
column6: tsiw nkorɔfo no; na sɛ eto hɔn a
column8: ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na hom dze bɔn etua papa kaw yi?"

column2: "Ana nnyɛ iyi na mo wura nom ano
column3: na ɔdze hyɛ nkɔm ma ɔba mu no bi? Hom ayɛ bɔn dɛ hom ayɛ dɛm adze yi."
na ɔkaa nsɛm yi kyerɛɛ hɔn."
ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na mo wura ka nsɛm a ɔtse dɛm yi? Nyankopɔn mpa ngu dɛ wo nkowaa bɛyɛ dɛm adze yi."
sika a yehun no hɛn nkotoku mu no
column4: yɛdze sanee fii Keenan asaase do brɛɛ wo bio: ɔbɛyɛ dɛn na yebowia dwetɛ anaa sika wɔ wo wura ne fie?"

column2: "Wo nkowaa hɛn mu biara a ibohu no wɔ no hɔ no
column3: ma onwu
column4: na hɛn so yɛbɛyɛ mo wura nkowaa."

column3: Nna afei wɔmma ɔnyɛ dɛ mbrɛ hom aka yi ara: nyia wobohu no no hɔ no ɔbɛyɛ m'akowaa; na hom dze
column4: hom nndzi so."

column3: na nyimpa biara soɛɛ no kotoku too famu
column4: na nyimpa biara saan no kotoku ano."

column3: ofitsi panyin no do
column4: na ɔdze kɛpeem kakraba no do: na wohun kɔɔpow no wɔ Benjamin no kotoku no mu."

column3: na obiara dze n'adze soaa n'asoasopɔnkɔ
column4: na wɔsanee kɔr kurow no mu."

column2: "Na Juda nye no nuanom no baa Josef fie; nna ɔda ho wɔ hɔ: na wɔhwehwee famu wɔ n'enyim."

column3: Ebɛnadze na hom ayɛ yi? Ana hom nnyim dɛ nyimpa a ɔtse dɛ emi yi mubotum dɛ mehyɛ nkɔm ma ɔba mu bi a?"
Yɛnse mo wura dɛn? Yɛnka dɛn anaadɛ yerudua dɛn asan hɛnho? Nyankopɔn eyi wo nkowaa hɛn emumuyɛ edzi: hwɛ
column4: yɛyɛ mo wura no nkowaa
column5: hɛn nye nyia wohun kɔɔpow no wɔ ne nsamu nyinara."

column3: Nyankopɔn mpa ngu dɛ mebɛyɛ dɛm: nyia woehu kɔɔpow no wɔ ne nsamu no
column4: ɔnoara na ɔbɛyɛ m'akowaa; na hom dze
column5: hom nkɔ hom egya nkyɛn wɔ asomdwee mu."

column3: na ɔsee dɛ
column4: Ao mo wura
column6: ma w'akowaa nka asɛm kor wɔ mo wura n'asomu
column7: na mma wo bo mmfuw w'akowaa: osiandɛ tserɛ woara nye Farao."

column3: Ana hom wɔ egya
column4: anaa nua bi?"

column3: Yɛwɔ egya
column4: akɔdaa bi
column5: na no nkɔdaa ba kakraba bi; na no nua ewu na ne ba a aka ara nye no nko

column3: Wɔnkɛfa no mbrɛ me
column4: ma monhwɛ no."

column3: Abofra no fi n'egya nkyɛn a ɔnnkɛyɛ: na sɛ ofi n'egya nkyɛn a
column4: n'egya bowu."

column3: Gyedɛ hom nua kakraba no nye hom ba
column4: ɔno hom nnkohu m'enyim bio."

column3: m'egya nkyɛn no
column4: yɛkaa mo wura ne nsɛm no kyerɛɛ no."

column3: Hom nkɔ bio nkɔtɔ edziban kakra mbrɛ hɛn."
Yɛkɔ a ɔnnkɛyɛ: gyedɛ hɛn nua kakraba no ka hɛn ho
column4: ɔno yɛbɔkɔ: osiandɛ sɛ hɛn nua kakraba no nnka hɛn ho a

column3: m'egya no see hɛn dɛ
column4: Homara hom nyim dɛ me yer woo mba beenu maa me:"

column3: na mesee dɛ
column4: Ampaara wɔatsetsew no mu
column5: na munnhun no ara na ɔdze ebodu ndɛ yi:"

column2: "na sɛ hom yi oyi so wɔ me nkyɛn
column3: na mbusu bi ba no do a
column4: ɔno hom dze mo gon nam awerɛhow mu bɔkɔ nda mu."

column3: m'egya ne nkyɛn
column4: na sɛ abofra no nnka hɛn ho a
column5: ɔnam dɛ n'akoma da abofra no ho dodow ntsi
column7: "sɛ ohu dɛ abofra no nnka hɛn ho a
column8: ɔno obowu: nna wo nkowaa dze w'akowaa
column10: no gon nam awerɛhow mu akɔ nda mu."

column2: "Na w'akowaa midzii abofra no ho egyinamu maa m'egya dɛ
column3: Sɛ mammfa no mammbrɛ wo a
column4: ɔno mibedzi so wɔ m'egya n'enyim daa."

column3: meserɛ wo
column4: ma w'akowaa mindzi abofra no ananmu menyɛ mo wura ɔsomfo; na ma abofra no nye no nuanom nkɔ."

column2: "Na mibesi no dɛn na makɔ m'egya nkyɛn
column3: ber a abofra no nnka mo ho? Bɛyɛ na mehu mbusu a ɔbɛba m'egya no do."
